settings.discloseOnline-help: When enabled, new users will allow others to see when they are online. Admins and other users with permission will still be able to see online status regardless of this setting.
settings.indexProfile-help: When enabled, new users will allow search engines to index their profile page, unless blocked by other site or extension settings.
settings.followAfterReply-help: When enabled, new users will automatically follow discussions they reply to or comment on.
settings.postMentioned-help: When enabled, new users will automatically opt into receiving an email notification when one of their posts is mentioned.
settings.userMentioned-help: When enabled, new users will automatically opt into receiving an email notification when they are @mentioned.
settings.groupMentioned-help: When enabled, new users will automatically opt into receiving an email notification when a group they belong to is mentioned.
